issue.title: [C++] Create kernel to determine buffer memory "referenced" by arrays (even if there are offsets)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14356](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14356). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is difficult to calculate the size (in bytes) of an array that has offsets because offsets are "# of values" there is no type-erased way to known how many bytes each value occupies.
